short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A DevTools extension enabling smart tools for Tailwind CSS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gimli Tailwind is the most popular DevTools extension for Tailwind CSS developers. 
It lets you view and intuitively edit utility classes.

Intelligent suggestions for class names. It also supports searching for CSS property names.

âœ”ï¸ Instant feedback: Preview changes on hover.

âœ”ï¸ Quickly toggle utility values with Cmd/Ctrl + Click.

âœ”ï¸ Intuitive UI
We don't want to overwhelm developers with options and inputs. Hereâ€™s a list of features that enable developers to find relevant utilities quickly:

â¤ Variant override: Displays what variant is active.
â¤ Inputs are grouped the same way as in the official docs.
â¤ Some sections like Grid and Flex will only be visible when relevant.
â¤ Active inputs are always shown.
â¤ Customizable UI.

Personal data ğŸ”’
Gimli Tailwind will never collect any personal data, browsing history, etc.
